name: Double world pack and more
description:
A pixel art top down platform game asset all the game asset fit in a top down platformer world. 

2 different tile set and both of them 8 x 8

( Grassy, dirt tile) the tiles set contain but simple and complex tile

1 background

1 main character

5 frame idle

8 frame idle_look

8 frame walk

7 frame jumb

7 frame climb 

3 frame hurt

7 frame death

6 frame attack 1

7 frame attack 2

7 frame for both armed&unarmed

2 enemies and npc

(Attack, movement & death for the both of them)

Pick up 

Diamonds and animation

Coins and animation

Germs and animation

Heart beat animation

Key animations

Treasure 1 animations

Treasure 2 animations

Game console ui available (up, down, left, right, attack

This game asset contain everything you will need to start creating your first game or something you can use in your current project. It can be use in all game engine godot, unity etc including max 2d (game engine for Android). Containing Spritesheet and sliced up image

Hello 👋😁 my name is Christabel, I am 20 years old. I am relatively new to pixel art and I am learning godot, to create my first video game, I might shift to learning unity when I get a full functioning laptop. I am Giving this game asset for free so please check it out and leave a comment if you like it and also leave a comment if you have complains while using it, so I can learn better or be encouraged. If you find it really helpful please you can donate any amount, I need the money because I am looking forward to buying my own laptop since I share faulty laptop with my elder bro😅 and I now the page is looking bad but is my first time, I am not good at it but I will surely come back to improve, it I think i am to use some kind of css to design it?! I don't know but this is it without the css I guess 😅. If you read to this part of the page thank you.
